_header: When men beth merriest at their meal
_description: ‘Þenk on ȝesterday’ — fifteen l2-line stanzas (ababababbcbc) with refrain, ‘Þenk on ȝesterday’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Whon Men beoþ muriest at heor Mele[W]iþ mete & drink
                    to maken hem glade…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Whon men beoþ murgest at heor MeleI rede ȝe
                    þenke on ȝuster day
